𒂃 TUḪ ≠ 𒃮 GAB
𒂃 ≈ 𒋰𒊺 TUᵖŠE ≈ TUḪ tits
𒃮 ≈ 𒂃 TUḪᴿ thorax

𒃮 TUḪˡ թխել txel пухтан "bake" 𒂃 TUḪᴿ ≈ TIR in 𒂃𒆸 ≈ 𒌁𒆸 TIR.KÙ® track , tread
𒃮 TUḪᴿ ≈ Tür türmen "heap" 𓏏𓏏 tell 𒃮 TUḪᴿ ≈ Tür : 𒃮 DU₈ ≈ door in 𒍠𒂃 za₃du8 zadu "door jamb" #sippu

𒂃 duh 𓏏𓏏 dough 𓏏𓏏 bran™ 𒈭𒄷 dah-hu

𒃮 TUḪᴿ ≈ ter in -ter -do'er -does -dus -tus √do 𓂡 𓀜 in

𒀀𒅆 ᵍweir
𒀀𒅆𒃮 Werter "canal worker, channel guard" ⇔ 𒀴 ʷARAD ward warrant

DU8 | 𒂃 | duo 𓏏𓏏
DUḪ | 𒂃 | dudh=tits 𓏏𓏏

𒂃 TUḪ, DUḤ DUH du8 = [821x] breast, chest; frontier;

𒂃 du₈ do verb suffix 𒂃𒀀 du₈-a -doer passive person/noun suffix:

𒌆 tug₂ Tuch თექა teka "felt" 𒌆𒂃 tug₂du₈ tugdu felter 𒌆𒂃𒀀 tug₂du₈-a tugdua felt (inverse noun from verb)

𒋗 šu hand 𒋗𒂃 šu-du₈ hold (• handle handuˡ > holdu halte hold #kullu 𒋗𒂃𒀀 šu-du₈-a šudu'a 1. captive 2. guarantee (held promise)

𒅗 ka Kehle / Gurgel / mouth 𒅗𒂃 ka duh / kag duh 'to open the mouth'

other forms are less clear or don't follow that pattern

𒈬𒌦𒂃𒂃 mu-un-du8-du8 = stripped, made naked <> farmer
